name: Riddick: The Merc Files | A fast paced hide and seak combat action adventure in the Riddick Universe.
name_original: Riddick: The Merc Files | A fast paced hide and seak combat action adventure in the Riddick Universe.
description:
Eliminate mercenaries through stealth and combat!
The Mercenaries are after you throughout the galaxy! Use your takedown and battle skills to cause mayhem. Hide in the shadows, use firearms, or engage in open melee combat. Strike fear in your enemies. It’s fun, brutal, and badass!

Do you prefer to sneak and hide, or would you rather subdue and eliminate your enemies. Download now and make your choice!

You are Riddick. Showoff your skills!

Escape, trick, or fight your enemies. It’s all up to you how to complete your objectives.

Challenge yourself in Survival Mode. Stay alive as long as possible.

Voice-over by Vin Diesel.
